subscribe.description: Enjoy all ShopEasy Premium features and take your shopping experience to the next level!
subscribe.purchase_error: An error occurred while subscribing to the product.

intro.title: Welcome to ShopEasy!
intro.description: I'll help you organize your shopping and save money.

onboarding.feature_1_description: Create and manage shopping lists easily. Organize items by category, set quantities, and check them off as you shop.
onboarding.feature_2_description: Quickly create lists using artificial intelligence that suggests items based on your preferences.
onboarding.feature_3_description: Analyze your purchases over time, track your savings, and optimize your budget.
onboarding.feature_4_description: Receive reminders to buy items and updates about your shopping lists.
